summary: OWNER REPORTS THAT BALL SOCKET ON DRAG LINK SEPARATED CREATING A LOSS OF STEERING.  VEHICLE DEPARTED RIGHT SIDE OF ROADWAY AND CAME TO REST IN A SWAMP.  OWNER REPORTS VEHICLE MILEAGE AT JUST OVER 501,000.  ROUTINE INSPECTS FAILED TO REVEAL ANY INDICATION OF IMPENDING FAILURE.  THIS BALL SOCKET WAS NOT SUBJECT OF RECALL  *CB
